title: OxygenOS 15 Finally Lands on the OnePlus 12R
description: It arrived just recently for the OnePlus 12. The post OxygenOS 15 Finally Lands on the OnePlus 12R appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It arrived just recently for the OnePlus 12.
text: Following the launch of Android 15 via OxygenOS 15 for the OnePlus 12, it looks like the more budget-friendly OnePlus 12R has finally started receiving the latest Android upgrade. According to an official announcement from the OnePlus Community forums: We’re very excited to release OxygenOS 15 to the OnePlus 12R officially. This update is already rolling out in the IN/EU/GLO region in batches, and we plan to cover all users including NA next week. We will keep you posted on the progress in the thread. As such, the update will be released in all supported regions, including India with software version CPH2585_15.0.0.200(EX01), in North America with version CPH2611_15.0.0.200(EX01) starting next week, and in Europe/Globally with version CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01). Customized versions will also be available for India, North America, Europe, and Globally with software versions CPH2585_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), CPH2611_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), and CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), respectively. The OxygenOS 15 update features enhancements for stability, tweaks to the overall user interface, and the introduction of new features for productivity and more. It arrived just recently for the OnePlus 12. Source: OnePlus
html:
Following the launch of Android 15 via OxygenOS 15 for the OnePlus 12, it looks like the more budget-friendly OnePlus 12R has finally started receiving the latest Android upgrade. According to an official announcement from the OnePlus Community forums:

We’re very excited to release OxygenOS 15 to the OnePlus 12R officially. This update is already rolling out in the IN/EU/GLO region in batches, and we plan to cover all users including NA next week. We will keep you posted on the progress in the thread.

As such, the update will be released in all supported regions, including India with software version CPH2585_15.0.0.200(EX01), in North America with version CPH2611_15.0.0.200(EX01) starting next week, and in Europe/Globally with version CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01).

Customized versions will also be available for India, North America, Europe, and Globally with software versions CPH2585_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), CPH2611_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), and CPH2609_15.0.0.200(EX01M001), respectively.

The OxygenOS 15 update features enhancements for stability, tweaks to the overall user interface, and the introduction of new features for productivity and more. It arrived just recently for the OnePlus 12.

Source: OnePlus
